title: Reinvigorating Colorado's Yarn Economy
teaser: Harvest Public Media's Luke Runyon takes a look at one Colorado couple's bid to reinvigorate the wool economy.
contentencoded:
Ranchers in the Midwest and the Rocky Mountains have a rich heritage of raising sheep – either for their meat or for their wool.

Colorado ranks third in the country’s in wool production – even though the overall sheep herd there has been slipping for decades.

But one entrepreneur is hoping to reinvigorate the region’s wool economy.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Harvest Public Media’s Luke Runyon explains how.
